panels.description:
This widget displays the number of garbage collections grouped by collection type. The statistics take into account two types of garbage collections: Copy - the garbage collector moves objects with links from eden space to survivor space and from survivor space to tenured space, 
MarkSweepCompact - the garbage collector works in tenured space, live objects are moved to the beginning, so garbage remains at the end of memory.
panels.title: GC Collection Count

panels.description:
This widget displays the time spent on garbage collections grouped by collection type. 
The statistics take into account two types of garbage collections: Copy - the garbage collector moves objects with links from eden space to survivor space and from survivor space to tenured space, 
MarkSweepCompact - the garbage collector works in tenured space, live objects are moved to the beginning, so garbage remains at the end of memory.
panels.title: GC Collection Time

panels.description: This widget displays the general data on heap memory usage.
panels.title: Heap Memory Usage

panels.description: This widget displays the general data on heap memory usage in percent (%).
panels.title: Heap Memory Usage In Percent

panels.description: JVM Memory Pool consumption and limits.
panels.title: JVM Memory Pool

panels.description: This widget displays the general data on non heap memory usage.
panels.title: Non-Heap Memory Usage

panels.description: This widget displays the data about the thread count.
panels.title: Thread Count

panels.description:
Shows the current activity status of the backup daemon. The activity status can be one of the following:
* UP - There is at least one successful backup, and the latest backup is successful
* WARNING - There are no successful backups, or the last backup failed
* NOT ACTIVE - The backup is not satisfied
* MISSING - The host of ZooKeeper Backup Daemon is not specified
panels.title: Backup Daemon Status

panels.description:
Shows the state of the last backup. The backup status can be one of the following:
 
* SUCCESS - The latest backup is successful
* FAILED - The latest backup failed
* IN QUEUE - The latest backup is in queue
* IN PROGRESS - The latest backup is in progress
panels.title: Last Backup Status

panels.description: Shows the amount of successful backups
panels.title: Successful Backups Count

panels.description: Shows the amount of available backups
panels.title: Backups Count

panels.description: Transitions of ZooKeeper Backup Daemon statuses
panels.title: Backup Daemon Status Transitions

panels.description: Shows the period of time when the last backup process was ended
panels.title: Time of Last Backup

panels.description: Shows the period of time when the last successful backup process was ended
panels.title: Time of Last Successful Backup

panels.description: Shows the backup storage type
panels.title: Storage Type

panels.description: Shows the size of the last backup
panels.title: Backup Last Version Size

panels.description:
Shows the space occupied by backups and the remaining amount of space. 
Not all storage supports total size, so "Total Volume Space" metrics can be zeroed
panels.title: Storage Size/Free Space

panels.description: Shows time spent on last backup
panels.title: Time Spent on Backup
